Paragraph: The PCE level is the highest reported to date in the side - chain D-A conjugated copolymersbased single BHJ PSCs , which is twice higher than that of the corresponding main - chain D-A polymer - based ones.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| side-chain D-A conjugated copolymers |
| single BHJ PSCs (binary heterojunction polymer solar cells) |
| main-chain D-A polymer |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |
| side-chain D-A conjugated copolymers |
| main-chain D-A polymer |

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The PCE level is the highest reported to date in the side - chain D-A conjugated copolymersbased single BHJ PSCs , which is twice higher than that of the corresponding main - chain D-A polymer - based ones.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE level (Photovoltaic Efficiency) |
| reported level (in side-chain D-A conjugated copolymers based single BHJ PSCs) |
| highest reported to date |
| in side-chain D-A conjugated copolymers based single BHJ PSCs |
| twice higher |
| that of the corresponding main-chain D-A polymer based ones |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE level (Photovoltaic Efficiency) |
| reported level (in side-chain D-A conjugated copolymers based single BHJ PSCs) |
| twice higher |

Note: "highest reported to date in the side-chain D-A conjugated copolymers based single BHJ PSCs" and "corresponding main-chain D-A polymer based ones" can be considered as contextual information and not clear material properties. Therefore, they have been removed from the table.

Paragraph: The PCE level is the highest reported to date in the side - chain D-A conjugated copolymersbased single BHJ PSCs , which is twice higher than that of the corresponding main - chain D-A polymer - based ones.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Note: PCE stands for Power Conversion Efficiency. It is a material property that refers to the ability of a material to convert light energy into electrical energy.
